author: "Richer, Edmond, 1560-1631"
title: "Vindici¾ doctrin¾ majorum schol¾ Parisiensis, seu constans & perpetua schol¾ Parisiensis doctrina de authoritate & infallibilitate Ecclesi¾ in rebus fidei & morum. Contra defensores monarchi¾ universalis & absolut¾ Curi¾ Roman¾. Authore Edmundo Richerio ."
